cause.description:
Noam Chomsky, Professor of Liguistics at MIT, has been a major contributer to the ongoing dialogue on the War Against American Lead Terror. Beginning with the Vietnam War, he has spoken and written 64 books on the subject of world affairs.
1. Get Chomsky elected for President of the USA
2. Inform and educate concerning foreign policy issues.
3. Further the goals of Direct Democracy
cause.mission: Get Noam Chomsky Elected for President of the USA
cause.name: Chomsky For President
